name: Project: Midway
description:
Official Release date: 10-31-16, Halloween

If you want to see teasers, you can only see them here:http://www.joshandzachgames.wix.com

Gamejolt Page: http://gamejolt.com/games/project-midway/155511

-Story

You lost your money, you lost your house, you lost everything. And all you have is Great Depression. But you're not alone, the entire country is affected by it. Your family is poor, and lives in an extremely old and broken down home. with barely any food to eat and water to drink. But you happen to come across a place in a newspaper, and it has good pay that can get your family a better home and a normal life again.

HELP WANTED;

Chuck The Cheetah and Joe The Alligator's Midway Diner.

$75 an hour

Official Skype Fan-Chat: https://join.skype.com/ySdKJ4wO8MQO

This game will be made in the engine: Clickteam Fusion 2.5

-System Requirements

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Direct 3D 9 or above
